description: These are just some sad emojis that are crying a single tear. Sometimes, a single tear can be more powerful and meaningful than the drama of tears that just don’t have an end. Or maybe these emotes are just crying over something really innocent, like a sunset or the fact they have no more chocolate to snack on. I’ve been there, I get it. title: A Single Tear
